description:
What more could you want for Christmas than securing this fantastic property as your own?

Sitting on a massive 1282m2 block along an iconic Toowoomba tree lined street you will find this perfect family home. It is easy to imagine living in this property as soon as you walk into the front yard and through the front door, with timber floors and great natural light through the living areas this property really makes you feel at home.

You are welcomed to the property through the sunroom which flows into the lounge area and around through to the open-plan kitchen, dining and living space. The country-style kitchen is light and modern with all convenient appliances and gas cooking. Enjoy your family meal times in the dining as you are able to look out to the backyard and pool area.

There are 4 spacious bedrooms with built-ins and the main bedroom at the back of the home with views out to the yard features an ensuite bathroom. To add to the generosity of the home you will also find a large study area between the main bedroom and the other 3 rooms with plenty of room to put all of the kids in to do arts and crafts or school work, or for Mum and Dad to set up their home office. There is a family bathroom complete with a shower over a bath.

Being in Queensland the best bit about a Summertime Christmas is having plenty of room for the whole family to relax outside and swim in the pool. You can do just that here at 57 Buckland Street with a large undercover outdoor area with an outlook to the huge backyard perfect for those family cricket games and the inground swimming pool. There is also plenty of storage in the lockable garage and carport with a roller door. With a lick of paint and a few touch-ups here and there this house could be transformed into something extraordinary.

This home is perfect for investors looking for a big block for a future development site or the homemaker looking for a beautiful family home.

Features include:
- 1282m2 block
- Polished timber floors
- Open-plan kitchen, dining and living space
- Four spacious bedrooms with built-ins
- Large undercover outdoor area
- Inground swimming pool
- Lockable garage and carport with a roller door

GENERAL TENANCY AGREEMENT: This property is currently tenanted until October 2023

GENERAL RATES: $1,440.19 NET Half Yearly Approx.
WATER ACCESS: $349.55 NET Half Yearly Approx.

LAND SIZE: 1282 sqm* Approx

HOUSE SIZE: 240 sqm* Approx

SCHOOLS: This Property falls within the school catchment area for Harristown State School

To arrange an inspection or learn more, contact Alice Ridgway on 0488 085 880
